title: Find Your Perfect Printer
description: Let us help you choose the right printer for your home or office

questions.question: What will you be printing most often?

options.text: Mostly black and white documents (emails, recipes, tickets)
A mix of documents and color photos

questions.question: How many pages do you print in a typical month?
Do you need to scan, copy, or fax documents?

options.text: No, I just need to print
Yes, I need to scan and copy
Yes, I need everything including faxing

questions.question: How important is the cost of ink or toner to you?

options.text: Very important - I want the lowest ongoing costs
Not very important - I just want good quality

questions.question: Do you want to print from your smartphone or tablet?

options.text: No, I'll only print from my computer

questions.question: What is your budget for the printer itself?

laser.title: Laser Printer
reasons: Perfect for printing crisp black and white documents
Toner doesn't dry out if you don't print for a while
Fastest printing speeds for large documents
Lower cost per page than most inkjet printers

products.name: Brother HL-L2350DW
specs: Fast printing - up to 32 pages per minute
Wireless printing from computer and phone
Compact design fits on small desks
products.why: The Brother HL-L2350DW is our favorite basic printer. It's fast, reliable, and the toner lasts a long time. Perfect for seniors who mostly print text and don't want to deal with dried-out ink cartridges.

products.name: HP LaserJet M110we
specs: World's smallest laser printer in its class
Very simple to use with HP Smart app
Includes 6 months of toner through HP Instant Ink
products.why: If space is limited, the M110we is the perfect choice. It's tiny but performs well for daily black-and-white printing. The HP Instant Ink for toner means you never have to shop for toner again.

tank.title: Ink Tank Printer
reasons: Comes with enough ink for thousands of pages
Better for the environment (less plastic waste)

products.name: Epson EcoTank ET-2800
features: Cartridge-free printing with big ink tanks
Includes enough ink for up to 2 years
Save up to 90% on replacement ink bottles
products.why: The ET-2800 is the most affordable way to stop buying expensive ink cartridges. You just pour ink from bottles into the tanks. It's perfect if you print a lot of color documents or photos and hate overpaying for ink.

products.name: Canon MegaTank G3270
features: Each set of bottles equals 30 traditional cartridge sets
products.why: The Canon G3270 offers better photo quality than most ink tank printers. It's easy to set up and the front-facing tanks make it simple to see when you're running low. A great value for both home and office.

basic.title: Basic Inkjet Printer
reasons: Easy to set up and use occasionally

products.name: HP DeskJet 2755e
features: Works with Alexa and Google Assistant
HP Smart app for easy setup
Includes 6 months of HP Instant Ink free
products.why: The most affordable wireless all-in-one from a trusted brand. Perfect if you print very little and want something simple. The HP Instant Ink subscription can save money if you print regularly.

all-in-one.title: All-in-One Inkjet Printer
reasons: Highly versatile - does everything you need
Automatic document feeders for easy copying/scanning
Great for both documents and high-quality photos

products.name: Brother MFC-J995DW
features: All-in-one: print, scan, copy, and fax
Comes with ink for up to 2 years!
Very low cost per page (1.4¢ black, 6.7¢ color)
products.why: The Brother MFC-J995DW is the best all-around printer for most people. It includes enough ink to last up to 2 years, has low ongoing costs, and includes all the features you need. Excellent value and very reliable.

products.name: HP OfficeJet Pro 9125e
products.why: The OfficeJet Pro 9125e is built for productivity. Fast printing, automatic duplex scanning, and professional quality make it perfect for busy home offices. The HP+ service delivers ink before you run out.

products.name: Canon PIXMA TR8620a
features: Versatile all-in-one with great photo quality
products.why: The TR8620a balances great document printing with excellent photo quality. The 5-ink system produces vibrant photos, and it has all the features you need for home office work.
